WORDLIST_TOOLTIP_ALL_IMPORTANT.description: Make all words inside language block important

WORDLIST_TOOLTIP_NO_IMPORTANT.description: Remove important mark from all words inside language block

WORDLIST_TOOLTIP_REMOVE_ALL.description: Remove all words inside language block

WORDLIST_TOOLTIP_CHANGE_IMPORTANT.description: Change important status for the WordItem

WORDLIST_TOOLTIP_REMOVE.description: Remove the WordItem form the list

WORDLIST_TOOLTIP_TEXT_CONTEXT.description: Show panle with contexts for the wordItem

WORDLIST_DELETE_CONFIRM_MESSAGE.message: Do you really want to delete all word items from the list?

WORDLIST_BUTTON_CANCEL_DELETE.description: Button title for cancel delete all

WORDLIST_TOOLTIP_CANCEL_REMOVE_ALL.description: Cancel remove all words inside language block

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYCURRENTSESSION.description: Filter only those words that were selected in the current session

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYIMPORTANT.description: Filter only those words that has an important flag

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYWORDFORM_FULL.description: Filter only those words that has this word word

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYWORDFORM_PART.description: Filter only those words that has this part of word form

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYLEMMA_FULL.description: Filter only those words that has this lemma

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYLEMMA_PART.description: Filter only those words that has this part of lemma

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYWORDFORM_FULL_PLACEHOL.description: Placeholder for the text input for filter by word

WORDLIST_FILTER_BYLEMMA_FULL_PLACEHOLDER.description: Placeholder for the text input for filter by lemma

WORDLIST_FILTER_BY.description: Filter by label on the panel

WORDLIST_CURRENT_SESSION.description: Icon indicates, thats it was retrieved durent the current session

WORDLIST_DOWNLOAD_NOTICE.message: Your wordlist will be downloaded as tabular data file. It can be imported into a spreadsheet program. Columns are separated by semi-colons. (This feature may not work on iOS devices.)
